newsitem.title: USA: Barney's Inc complaint called absurd by Isetan.
newsitem.headline: Barney's Inc complaint called absurd by Isetan.

text.p: Attorneys for Isetan Co Ltd called "absurd" complaints by Barney's Inc Isetan's Barney's Japan unit breached the terms of the license agreement for use of the "Barneys New York" trademark.
The allegations are based upon accusations Barney's Inc knows to be untrue, said Howard Kaufman of Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP, the law firm representing Isetan.

As part of the same 1989 license agreement cited in the complaint filed on September 19 against the Isetan unit, the licensing unit of Barney's Inc agreed to transfer its royalty rights to Isetan of America as part of the terms of a loan made by Isetan of America for about US$40 million .
Barney's Inc said on September 19 it was seeking to terminate its license agreements with Barney's Japan and is also seeking to void certain Isetan security interests in Barney's.
Isetan of America is the U.S. unit of the Japanese retailer.
